title: Beginner's Guide to Making Fire
content: Step 1: Gather materials—dry tinder (grass, bark), kindling (twigs), and fuel wood (logs). Step 2: Build a structure—teepee or log cabin shape. Step 3: Light it—use matches, lighter, or a firestarter. Shield from wind. Step 4: Add fuel slowly and maintain the fire. Don’t smother it. Keep water nearby for safety.
